title: PRICE REDUCED AGAIN - 1909-11 T206 Polar Bear - VIC WILLIS
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: PRICE REDUCED AGAIN - 1909-11 T206 Polar Bear - VIC WILLIS
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the following 1909-11 T206 Polar Bear of HOFer Vic Willis.

Asking [STRIKE]$140[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$115[/STRIKE] $105 net to me.  I'll cover any shipping.  Please email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url].

edited on 9/23 to add: When looking at the card under closer inspection, it appears that there is a surface wrinkle on the front that extends at a slight angle from the top of the card to the bottom.  Accordingly, I have knocked off quite a few bucks off the original price.

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1909-11%20Willis%20T206%20Polar%20Bear.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1909-11%20Willis%20T206%20Polar%20Bear%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]
bump for fairly significant price reduction and additional (new) information on the condition of the card.
